data.name: BIGFOOT - "SKIN "DRUID"
data.detailed_description:
Decorate your Bigfoot character with the DRUID skin.

Skin can be selected at the lobby stage using the drop-down list next to your character.
data.about_the_game:
Decorate your Bigfoot character with the DRUID skin.

Skin can be selected at the lobby stage using the drop-down list next to your character.
data.supported_languages: English, German, Russian, Ukrainian, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese, Turkish, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7, 8.1, 10, 11 (Only 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel i3 8130U(2Cores, 2.3GHz) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 730 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11 (Only 64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (64bit) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 980 or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
